attributes.action: urge BBC Radio 5 to withdraw Steve McClaren from the broadcast team
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After his outrageous failure managing the England National team he should not be allowed to make even more money commentating on a competition that he failed to qualify for, especially as he didn't have the decency to resign opting instead for a massive payout by getting the push. Not only will he be getting paid AGAIN for his substandard efforts in charge of the England National team he will be getting paid out of the pockets of the people he let down, the license paying England supporting public.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
